I’m a Professor for Information Management at the [Berlin School of Library and Information Science](https://www.ibi.hu-berlin.de/de/forschung/infomanagement) at Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin and a Scientific Consultant for Open Science at the [Helmholtz Association’s](https://www.helmholtz.de/) [Open Science Office](https://os.helmholtz.de/).

On this website you will find some information about my work.
